page_content: Discussion on the implementation and evaluation of a new salary statement system, addressing its bureaucratic implications and advocating for a pilot phase before its introduction.
Information about the annual siren tests conducted across Switzerland on February 4, 2015, explaining the purpose and procedure of the tests.
Discussion regarding stamp duty in the canton of Ticino on ASTRA contract works in the canton of Graub端nden, exploring tax implications for Graub端nden companies.
Announcement regarding traffic disruptions in Davos due to sports events on July 23, 2022, providing details on the events and affected areas.
Advisory for beekeepers on coordinated Varroa mite treatment, with guidelines for managing the treatment amidst high temperatures.
Inquiry regarding the implementation of a new salary statement, examining its feasibility and implications for both employers and employees.
Inquiry regarding spatial planning in the context of new zoning regulations in Canton Zurich and its implications for similar settlements in Canton Graub端nden.
Instructions and application forms for sports funding in various areas such as sports events, sports equipment, and sports facilities, provided by the Canton of Graub端nden.
Guide to the 2009 tax declaration for natural persons available in electronic form, with distribution scheduled along with the tax declaration in January.
Warning about fraudulent attempts via email and counterfeit checks targeting businesses and individuals, along with advice on how to handle such situations.
Safety advice regarding fireworks on National Day, mentioning the risks of mishandling fireworks and providing guidelines to ensure safety.
